title: Levelized Cost of Energy by Technology

source.dataset: Annual Energy Outlook, Levelized Costs of New Generation Resources

caveats: LCOE reflects the estimated revenue required to build and operate a new plant over its financial life.
LCOE does not capture integration costs (transmission, storage, balancing) for variable resources or value differences by dispatch profile.
EIA AEO LCOE assumes plants enter service in the projection year (2030 for current AEO). Technology costs and performance assumptions evolve between vintages.
Private estimates (Lazard, BNEF) exist and may differ due to different assumptions about cost of capital, capacity factors, and policy incentives.
Values do not include tax credits or subsidies unless noted.
